rules_text:
When Lust for Life enters, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
[i]Augmented[/i] – Whenever a creature you control enters, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, you may sacrifice Lust for Life. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature.
notes: The Cult of Dionysus — The Orion Experience
